text: if you could suddenly move your data

over your existing infrastructure and

how does IBM espera deliver these
benefits across industries by overcoming
the limitations that exist when moving
big files over long distances web
browsing FTP and other file transfer
services typically rely on the
transmission control protocol or TCP TCP
provides reliable data delivery under

IBM Apsaras patented fast adaptive and
secure protocol fast technology reliably

by fully utilizing available bandwidth
in addition it's unique adaptive rate
control delivers this high performance
without impacting other business

data transfers can write directly to
